main_definition: Mobile refers to something that can be easily moved or is not fixed in one place, often used as an adjective.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to devices that have wireless communication capabilities.
meanings_and_examples.example: I use my mobile phone to make calls and send text messages.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Capable of being easily moved or not fixed in one place.
meanings_and_examples.example: The mobile office allowed the employees to work from anywhere, even on vacation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Annual financial statements prepared for a business entity that is required by law to be submitted periodically.
meanings_and_examples.example: Companies are required to file their mobile statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).

meanings_and_examples.definition: A term used in telecommunication to describe devices or systems designed for portability.
meanings_and_examples.example: Mobile broadband allows users to access the internet while on the move.
